annotation_sentence: Oh, yes, Xiao Ming. I was a bit... um, how to say... confused?

annotation_sentence: Um, you say we meet at, uh, nine o'clock, but I think you mean the morning?

annotation_sentence: Ah, okay! I thought you say a.m.

annotation_sentence: Yes, a little bit. I wait for one hour and then go home.

annotation_sentence: Yes, that is good idea. We can say "p.m." or "a.m." also, right?

annotation_sentence: Um, maybe we have coffee next time? I, um, still enjoy our talk.
